document_data.name: Burnt Wagon Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Burnt Wagon Way''' was a corduroy-log paved road in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran west off of an intersection of [[Zendulth Street]] and the [[Wall Way]], then terminated on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High road]] alongside the [[Winter Path]]. Along the way, it acted as the northern terminus of [[Vellarr's Lane]] and the [[Street of the Tusks]].

Notable Locations.Links to Sewers: An entrance to the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|sewers of Waterdeep]] was located at the mouth of a dead-end alley opening that was just south off this street.
